resources.string: Join your favorite communities in Campfire

Campfire offers many social functions. Fandoms, chats, system and karma. Create an account and become a moderator of the fandom. For each community there is only one fandom, there is no creator or administrator, fandom is controlled only by its subscribers.
Campfire has anime fandoms and gaming fandoms.

Determines the amount of karma that is used in rates of publications and affects abilities in the application. Achieve the achievements to increase the level.

To use moderator priviledges, you need to have karma in the fandom, and for admin functions, you need to have karma for 30 days throughout the application. Using karma for abilities does NOT reduce karma.

Please read all the rules of the application, it does not take much time, and it will help you to better understand how our community works.
Spam prohibited. Repeatedly create similar publications or messages in the chat.
It is forbidden to insult other users. Jokes are not prohibited, but don\'t go too far. Joke without offending anyone.
Prohibited curse language and direct mat.
Sabotaging is prohibited. Sabotaging includes: purposefully mocking other users, specifically interfere with chatting, cause problems with the application.
Forbidden to publish pornography, immoral/illegal/shock content.
Forbidden off-topic and meaningless publication. Publications are not related to fandom, meaningless polls.
Advertising spam is prohibited. Regularly asking for subscribes to the channel, etc.
Do not publish several posts that can be done by one. For example, 10 pictures with game characters should be published in one post, not ten.
Story spoilers must be placed under the "spoiler" card, and in the header of the card must be a warning.
Forbidden to unreasonably give negative ratings to all publications in a row.
Forbidden to publish pirated content, torrents and links to it. (hacked games, pirated music ...)
It is forbidden to use text formatting without a reason. For example, you can not just do all text green or bold.
It is forbidden to beg to rate on the publication.
It is forbidden to use the app functions to the detriment. For example, to make a post multilingual if it may not be understood in other languages.

Great power comes with great responsibility. Please read all the rules for moderators and use privileges for the benefit of the community. If you violate the rules of moderation, your account will be blocked for a long time and may be deprived of the right to moderate in the future. Administrators can see deleted posts and take action if a moderator has broken the rules.
Don\'t be too strict. Remember that we do not have a totalitarian regime. Don\'t delete publications and don\'t block users for every little thing.
You cannot use the privileges of moderation for personal likes or dislike. For example, you cannot delete a post because you personally don\'t like the author of the post.
When changing or allowing a fandom remember that the fandom exists in several languages. Don\'t use any language other than English in the pictures and name.
Write clear and detailed comments. It is important that users understand why the publication was blocked, tag was deleted, etc.
When editing and rejecting the fandom, be sure to write a comment in English. If you write a comment in another language many people will not understand.

Marking publications as important is possible. But do so ONLY if it is a really important publication and everyone interested in fandom needs to know. Example: news from game developers. Important publications are not fan art, guides, pictures, etc.

Add only related links to fandom. Such links are: official website, wiki page, tweeter, forum, discord and similar. It is forbidden to add links that are not common to the fandom, such as a custom channel on YouTube or twitch, third-party servers or similar. It is also strictly forbidden to add links to pirated content.
You can delete publications that have a lot of negative karma or poor-quality publications, but only in cases where it does not go against the first rule of moderation.
Real and additional names of the fandom that can be used for searching. Only add meaningful additional names to fandoms. Example for the Campfire fandom - cf, Camp, Camp fire.
On each topic there is only one fandom, the whole community in one place.
Posts and comments can be rated both positively and negatively, fair rate the publication, so you make the tape better.
Increase your level and you will get many privileges. Moderator and administrator functions, customization of your profile and much more.
There are a lot of moderators in Campfire, any intruder will be quickly punished and will not be able to spoil your mood :)
The application is being actively developed, a new version is released every week. And although the application already has many functions, they will become even more.
A very brief description of the main elements and systems of the application. It will allow you to better understand how our community works.

Only one fandom can be created per topic. For example, there can not be two fandoms about Minecraft. 

Fandom exists in several languages ​​at once. The community for each language has its own feed, chat and moderators. 

To be a moderator in a fandom you need to reach a certain level in Campfire to unlock moderator functions and score certain amount of karma for 30 days. 

Karma for 30 days in a fandom is taken into account for the language in which the publication was made. 

Any actions performed by moderators are published in the "moderation" section of the fandom, where they can be assessed and commented. 

If there are very few people in the fandom and it is impossible to get the karma necessary for moderation, you can post an "application" for the moderator in this fandom and ask the administrator to make you a moderator for the fandom.
There is 1 global chat for each language for each fandom. \n\nImages in the chat are deleted every other day to save server memory.

It is displayed on the user's avatar. 

User's level affects that user's rating to a post. 

The level can be increased only by achieving achievements. 

The higher the level, the more privileges in the application is unlocked (up to administrative functions).

Karma is earned by getting ratings on the post, comments and moderation actions. 

Karma can be subtracted if the scores are negative. 

Karma is required to use moderator and admin functions. 

One user can change the karma of another user only once in 24 hours, all other ratings will only affect the publication.
Displayed at the top of main screen. \n\nUpdated at 00:00 server time (UTC+3).
